results.analysis:
{"summary": "Implement 
Feature: Context Graph Builder
Description: Palantir-style ontology-based graph construction
Layer: 3_worlds
Pillar: context
Source: Palantir

Requirements:
- Entity types: User, City, Pack, Workflow, Event
- Edge types: influence, affects, depends_on, produces
- Ontology validation
- Query time < 50ms

API Endpoints:
- /graph/node/add
- /graph/edge/add
- /graph/ontology/validate
- /graph/query

Files to generate:
- core/graph/builder.py
- core/graph/ontology.py
- core/graph/query_engine.py
", "files": ["src/feature.py", "tests/test_feature.py"], "dependencies": ["fastapi"], "complexity": "medium", "steps": ["1. Design", "2. Implement", "3. Test"]}
